name: Bless
area: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
text:
Bless fills your allies with courage. Each ally gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and on saving throws against fear effects.

Bless counters and dispels bane.
mythicText: The +1 morale bonus applies on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and all saving throws. Once during the spell’s duration, an affected creature can roll an attack roll or saving throw twice and take the higher result. The target must decide to use this ability before the first roll is attempted.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 法器
area_zh: 施法者, 以及以施法者为中心半径50尺爆发区域内的所有盟友
text_zh:
祝福术让你的盟友充满了勇气。每个盟友都在攻击检定和对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+1士气加值。

祝福术反制和解除‘绝望术 (bane)’。
mythicText_zh: 法术的+1士气加值会应用至攻击检定、武器伤害检定以及所有豁免检定上。在法术的持续时间内仅限一次，受影响的生物能够在一次攻击检定或豁免检定中，投掷两次并取较高的结果。目标必须在掷出首次检定之前决定是否使用该能力。
